tooltip: Select Princess Ruto, Sage of Water, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Princess Ruto focuses on improving the armor and resistance of Dominion units.
Allows you to summon Ruto, a Mage hero with freezing ice attacks.
Non-combat Mage that dramatically improves all Armor types of attached battalion.
Sapphire Warden attack now slows enemies.
Improves all the armor types of many Dominion units.
